summary: This document is a letter from an unnamed official to J. Edgar Hoover regarding information on policy matters discussed by William Z. Foster and members of the French Communist Party in Paris. The letter summarizes actions taken by the organization on Foster's trip, including alerting stations on his itinerary and reporting on his meetings with Thorez and Duclos. The letter also mentions information from H.I.6, Section 7 regarding topics discussed at a meeting.
title: Information on William Z. Foster and French Communist Party
